items.title: US government issues major travel advisory for Asian country
items.description: The advisory warns of "protests and curfews could happen with little warning."

items.title: Amazon is selling a $280 27-inch smart monitor for $150 with 'crystal-clear picture'
items.description: This monitor works as a computer or TV.

items.title: Fashion retail chain forced into Chapter 7 bankruptcy, liquidates
items.description: The clothing and lifestyle brand is closing all of its stores and its website for good on Sept. 13.

items.title: Coca-Cola steps up to solve huge beverage problem
items.description: Coca-Cola makes an unexpected move to address a rising threat to its business.

items.title: Hunting Golden Dome defense stocks? Follow the jobs
items.description: 6 stocks that stand out in their accelerated hiring for roles with security clearances
